Package org.nlpub.watset.graph

Class Watset<V,​E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nlpub.watset.graph.Watset<V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - node class.
    E - edge class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clustering<V>
    public class Watset<V,​E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clustering<V>
    Watset is a local-global meta-algorithm for fuzzy graph clustering. It builds an intermediate undirected graph that addresses the element ambiguity by inducing different senses of each node in the input graph.
    See Also:
    Ustalov et al. (ACL 2017)

        Sets up the Watset clustering algorithm.
        Parameters:
        graph - an input graph.
        local - a supplier for a local clustering algorithm.
        global - a supplier for a global clustering algorithm.
        similarity - a context similarity measure.
